JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Summary 

Sr. Experienced Software Developers with at least 2 yrs to 4 yrs of experience working on ASP.Net,    C# platform capable of working independently on web projects. 

Job Description Developing web applications using ASP.Net,    C# with backend as SQL Server. 

Other Skills required are HTML,    JavaScript,    AJAX,    Crystal Reports,    knowledge of WCF will be an added advantage. 

The position reports to Sr. Software Developer /    Team Leader. 

Key Skills ASP.Net,    C#,    MS SQL Server,    HTML,    JavaScript,    AJAX
